title: Anti Gravity Hat
description: Ruin a gentleman's day by making his hat fly away!

title: Aviatomobile
description: A burgundy toy car, bewitched to take off. Inspired by Ron's misadventures getting to school his second year.

title: Bang Bang Boggart Banger
description: You'll get your bang for your buck on this product!

title: Bombtastic Bomb
description: Disastrous Delights!

title: Box 'O' Rockets
description: It's explosive!

title: Boxing Telescope
description: When it is squeezed, a tiny fist on a spring erupts from its end and lands a punch, accompanied by a puff of black smoke and a loud bang.[1] The purple bruise caused by the telescope does not fade by itself, and cannot be healed with standard remedies such as can be found in The Healer's Helpmate.[1] The only known means to remove is another Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes product, Bruise removal paste.[1]

title: Broom Broom Kit
description: The Broom Broom kit was a broomstick-modifying kit. It promises to bling up your broom and includes a pointed cap for the end of the handle, a pair of fins that slid onto the handle, a tailfin that was attached on top of the bristles, and a rocket booster for the back underside.

title: Bruise Removal Paste
description: a thick yellow paste guaranteed to remove any bruise within an hour.

title: Calamity Lotion
description: In the Muggle world, this would seem to have a parallel in calamine lotion, an anti-itching agent often used to treat conditions like sunburn, rashes, poison ivy and insect bites.

title: Canary Creams
description: Temporarily transfigures the eater into a canary.

title: Candy In a Can
description: This product contains candy

title: Comb-a-Chameleon
description: A hairbrush that magically changes your hairstyle! Made out of pure Romanian celanese acetate, it can be used by either gender or any age group.

title: Creepy Crawlies
description: These creepy crawlies will scare anyone! Purchase if you dare.

title: Crush Blush
description: One of our many love potions!

title: Crystal Incantation Comet
description: A rocket like no other.

title: Cupid Crystals
description: A sure way to get your man!

title: Decoy Detonators
description: When dropped they run away and explode out of sight, giving the person a diversion if necessary.

title: Demon Box
description: Behold the fantabulous demon wonderbox and all that lives inside. Do not feed anything that comes out of the box after midnight as they tend to multiply and savage anyone who comes in there [sic] way. The fantabulous demon wonderbox does not promote the blindfolding of horses.

title: Demon Dung Crackers
description: Fireworks with more a kick, and a bang! (Not for the faint of heart.) Warning: Smelly.

title: Edible Dark Marks
description: They'll make anyone sick!

title: Eduardo's Unbreakable Eggs
description: Eggs that can't be broken!

title: Electric Shock Shake
description: Crowd pleasing concoctions! Warning: Not safe for pregnant witches.

title: Everlasting Eyelashes
description: A magical cosmetic aid. Think, demure.

title: Extendable Ears
description: Long, flesh-coloured pieces of string which one can insert in one's ear, then shove the other end under (for example) a door, and one will hear the conversation or other noise as clear as if it was mere foot away, unless, that is, the door has been Imperturbed.

title: Fanged Flyer
description: Fanged Frisbee - handler's glove included.

title: Feathery Flamingo Flame Fuzzer
description: Want pizazz with your rocket?

title: First Love Beguiling Bubbles
description: Popular with the Hogwarts crowd, the easiest way to get a date for the next weekend at Hogsmead!

title: Flirting Fancies
description: You'll only have success!

title: Happy Bubble Box
description: Wait until you see what's inside!

title: Haunted Deck
description: Blow away Muggles with your adeptness!

title: Headless Hat
description: Small hats covered in pink feathers. When worn, the hat and head of the person wearing it, disappears. Although they are good for frightening people, they do not last very long.

title: Jinx-Off
description: A spell-protection kit that includes a hat, cloack and gloves.

title: Jumping Snakes
description: Venomous Vertical Sea Snakes

title: Just Like That Hat
description: What will come out of it next?

title: Kissing Concoction
description: Lick-lop guaranteed.

title: Love is Blind Eye Serum
description: Literally.

title: Lucky Dip Box
description: A surprise is in store for those brave enough to purchase.

title: Maryâ€™s Magic Mice
description: What did Mary have up her sleeve?

title: Miraculous Mystic Mayhem Makers
description: Not for the faint of heart.

title: Miraphorus Magic Set
description: Limited edition! Comes with a pair of Miraphorus red gloves.

title: Nose Biting Teacup
description: A teacup bewitched to bite the nose off of an enemy.

title: Patented Daydream Charms,
description: Virtually undetectable highly realistic thirty-minute daydreams (side-effects can be: slight drooling and a dazed expression, Not for sale for wizards under 16).

title: Peace Disturber
description: Feeling rowdy?

title: Penelopeâ€™s Purple Pussy Cats
description: The perfect gift for your inner cat woman.

title: Peruvian Instant Darkness Powder
description: When thrown into the air, this powder covers everything around it in darkness, which cannot be penetrated by spells like Lumos or Incendio, although the Hand of Glory can be used to see through it. It is used by Draco Malfoy against the members of Dumbledore's Army while smuggling Death Eaters into Hogwarts through the Room of Requirement.

title: Portable Swamp
description: Creates a swamp when used.

title: Pygmy Puffs
description: Miniature puffskeins with pink or purple fur. They have small, beady eyes and ears. Ginny Weasley is a known owner of Arnold the Pygmy Puff.

title: Rocket Box
description: A rocket variety pack!

title: Self Inking Quill
description: Inks itself!

title: Self-propelling Custard Pies
description: Bad aim? No problem! These pies lob themselves and never miss. Includes two pies, no expiration date.

title: Self-Writing Quill
description: Mind blank? This is the quill for you! Gives the impression of productivity while you're free to day dream.

title: Silver Sparkling Snakes
description: Fireworks that add dazzle to your display.

title: Skiving Snackbox
description: A Skiving Snackbox is a range of sweets to make the user ill. The user develops strange symptoms depending on the type of snack eaten. The purpose of these was to make a student appear unable to stay in class. Most came in two colour-coded parts: one that would cause the malady, and one that would heal the pupil once they had left class. It should be noted that nosebleed nougat is most popular. They include: Fainting Fancies, Fever Fudge, Nosebleed Nougat, and Puking Pastilles.

title: Smart Answer Quill
description: Unsure of the answer? This quill will at the least make you appear to be very witty.

title: Smith & Co. Tick Tock Clock
description: The best Muggle clock in the wizarding world (second only to the real thing)!

title: Spell Checking Quill
description: Checks your terrible spelling for you!

title: Sticky Trainers
description: Sticky Trainers are yellow trainers with suction cups attached to the soles. The wearer can use them to climb walls and to walk across ceilings.

title: Sunny Spells
description: This will cure your rainy days!

title: Ten-Second Pimple Vanisher.
description: Excellent on everything from boils to blackheads.

title: Thor's Thunder Cracker
description: This rocket will make you run for cover!

title: Tiny Twister
description: A miniature tornado in a tall glass jar.

title: Ton-Tongue Toffee
description: These sweets cause the tongue to rapidly swell and turn purple and swell to an indeterminate size (at least four feet long)

title: Trick Wands
description: Make sure you don't use this in a duel!

title: Twilight Moonbeams
description: Perfect for after sunset.

title: U-No-Poo
description: The constipation sensation that's gripping the nation!

title: Umbridge on Unicycle
description: I will have order! I really hate children. - The toy

title: Wakefields Off the Record Glow in the Dark Gum
description: Gum that glows!

title: Weasleys' Wildfire Whiz-bangs
description: Unstoppable fireworks that are charmed to explode when struck with a Stunning Spell, and to multiply by ten when hit with a Vanishing Charm. They include shocking-pink Catherine wheels, fire-breathing dragons, sparklers that spell out profanity, rockets with long tails of silver stars and firecrackers. When any two types collide, they make new kinds such as flying silver and pink pigs.

title: Weather in a Bottle
description: Unleash gewitter!
